{%- if param.name == "..." -%}
:param vararg: {{ param.desc|process_link }}
:type vararg: {% include "type.rst" %}
{% else -%}
:param {{ param.name }}: {{ param.desc|process_link }}

{% endif -%}
{% endwith -%}
{%- endfor -%}
